title: From wiretap accusations to travel ban 2.0, here's what Trump did this week
text: As the saying goes, time is an infinite loop. There’s no better proof of that than Donald Trump ’s early presidency, where week seven has already brought what feels like a lifetime of nonstop news. Here’s your recap:
